Figurative Meaning (Contextualized Defin: One will face the consequences of one’s own actions.
Usage Contexts: Daily advice, parenting, education, moral instruction, sermons
Cultural Origin or Historical Reference: Agrarian Acehnese society where planting and harvesting symbolize moral causality.
